name: THE SORCERER'S RING: A QUEST OF HEROES - DEMO
name_original: THE SORCERER'S RING: A QUEST OF HEROES - DEMO
description:
THE SORCERER'S RING: A QUEST OF HEROES

Based on a book by Morgan Rice

This is the story of a young boy learning about his past and the secrets of his future and how he can shape the destiny of a land on the brink of war.

This is my first time using RPG Maker VX Ace and my first game Jam.

Game Designed by Kevin Rowe @krowerowe

Assets provided by RPGmaker VX ACE
